name: Sex Dice!
description:
Do you want to spice things up for you and your lover? This Sex Dice app is just for you! Two modes – forplay and sex position/places will surly make your sex life more exciting!

Features:
- shake or tap dices to roll
- tap arrows button to change dices – 2 options to choose: forplay dices and position/places dices
- turn on/off sounds
- 3 lovely themes to choose

Forplay dices posibilities:
- kiss, bite, lick, suck, touch, rub
- lips, neck, ears, ass, nipples, below waist

Position/places dices posibilities
- living room, car, kitchen, bathroom, bedroom, garden
- 6 best sex possition :)
